main event: An observer sighted an unidentified object moving from north to south in Harrison, New York on August 19, 1965.
interesting points: The observation took place at 2:00 A.M., The object was traveling at a high rate of speed, The observer detected no sound from the object, The object had bright navigation lights and glowed from the center, The conclusion drawn was that it was a satellite.
witness description: The observer reported seeing the object while looking south.
